name: BeyondRM Platform
tagline: The BeyondRM Platform modules, which provide basic handling of editor project and engine game assets.
body:
#BeyondRM_Platform
==================
The BeyondRM Platform modules, which provide basic handling of editor project and engine game assets. This is for the meta-data associated with the graphics, sounds, and scripts related to the resulting game, as well as the dependency libraries for the editor to implement such in a game.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
